titles.title: Data Theft Prevention Act of 2006
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the unauthorized removal or use of personal information contained in a database owned, operated, or maintained by the Federal Government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/21/2006--Introduced. Data Theft Prevention Act of 2006 - Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit: (1) the unauthorized viewing, use, downloading, or removal of any means of identification or individually identifiable health information contained in a federal database or the transfer of such information to another database; and (2) the use of such information to violate federal or state criminal law.
